description: Congratulations Rui! I'm sending my best wishes to you and your family through this NFT, I hope you like it. You're such an integral part of our team, and even more so, an absolute pleasure to work with. Over the last year, I've enjoyed collaborating with you, learning from you. You're coding, design and ideation skills, as well as the way you think and approach complex problems has always amazed me and inspired me to produce better work myself. Although I do wish you are enjoying your time off with family , I look forward to us collaborating on more work in the near future.
name: Best Wishes from Eshaan Rao
